quote: Abraham repeated concerning his wife Sarah: “She is my sister.” So A·bimʹe·lech king of Geʹrar sent for Sarah and took her.
So the chiefs of the people and all the tribes of Israel took their places in the congregation of God’s people—400,000 foot soldiers armed with swords.
Then he sent messengers to King Aʹhab of Israel at the city and said to him: “This is what Ben-haʹdad says,
